msbt.message: , you know , yeah?I've never introduced myselfbut I wanna. Real bad. Could ya ask them to say hey sometime, ?
Didja hear about the thing that did?
Guess what was doing the other day!
I haven't seen much lately. If ya see them, let 'em know I miss 'em, .
I saw today! They looked like they were having more fun than a new bag of snacks!
I saw yesterday. I dunno what they were doing, but I wanna try doing it too!
What's up to these days? I forget when I saw them last.
It's real neat how came over from .
came over from . It was real neat to see them!
I hope comes to say hi soon I miss them.
It's real neat that could visit us!I hope they get to come back soon. And that they bring snacks too!
Your friend is from ?I've heard of that place. They make real tasty and smoothies.
It was real super fun having visit!And it's neat they flew all the way from !My arms get tired just flying across the island!
Your friend who visited us the other daythink they'll visit again? They're from , right? That's pretty far, but I hope they drop by again, !
I heard they were here a long time. They musta had a buncha fun!

They fished a bunch, huh? It's a little selfish, but I was, um, kinda worried they'd catch all our fishAfter they left, I counted our fish.<10_4 /> I lost count at seven, and fell asleep in the river.But it's all good. We still got fish, .
They was catching a buncha bugs, yeah? Did they meet anybody cool?
I heard they picked up a buncha shells. Shells are real neat. They're old, tiny sea houses, !
They were digging up clams? Man, clams are taaaasty. It's the only thing me and fish agree on.
Is it true they popped one of those balloons that fly by sometimes? Was there something good inside?
Did they wish on a bunch of shooting stars? I did. I wonder if maybe we wished on the same ones?Man, those stars'll be busy!
Were they, um, shaking trees? Did any pants fall out? I ain't been able to find my pants in forever.
Were they out hittin' trees 'cause they wanted wood for DIY projects? Or did they just wanna meet wasps?!
They were cutting down all those trees. Don't they like ?
Oh? They planted a buncha plants? I wondered who did that! Tell them thanks!
I noticed there were a buncha wet flowers and I wondered why, but then I realized they probably watered 'em.I'd think I'd make a real good detective, !
Their expressions were wild. They were BAM one second, then POW the next, and then WACK-ZING!It was real impressive.

I heard they were poppin' in and out of their place all day. Like they're up to somethingYou think they're secretly planning to be up to something?DO YA THINK THEY'RE SOME KINDA MASTERMIND PLANNING TO TAKE OVER ?!Or maybe they were just running errands? I dunno!
Didja see how they invited a buncha friends over from other islands? The airport was crazy busy!
They were doing a buncha DIY stuff, yeah? What were they making?<10_4 /> Can I please have it, ?
Hey, did they break some tools? I broke some of my tools and got worried someone would yell at me.But I'm an adult, so I'm who has to pay for the broken thing I'mwho has to pay for the broken thing!
They spent all their time inside. I wonder what they were up to? Ooh! Was there a buffet in there?
I heard that they spent a lotta time outdoors. That's good because outdoors is where the bugs are!For most people.
I heard they were walking around with a shovel. Were they burying stuff? Or digging it up?

I heard they fell into, like, a bunch of pitfall traps. That's a shame. I fall in pitfall holes a bunch too.I even fall into holes that aren't pitfalls—they're just holes.<10_4 /> I fall in the river a lot too.
I heard a buncha banging and kla-booming at their place. Were they moving furniture around?I oughta rearrange my place. Making all that noise would be a buncha fun, !

I know they were being real serious with their phone. I bet they were makin' designs, weren't they?When I get serious like that, I stick my tongue out and wrinkle up my forehead so I can think extra hard.

They talked to me a lot!At first, I was scared everybody else left the island for the day, and I was the only one to talk to.Then I was hoping everybody was gone for the day because I was really enjoying the attention.
I saw them chatting with a bunch. has the weirdest stories. I bet they wanted to hear all of 'em, !
Someone said they talked to all the folks on the island. And probably a few bugs too, !

Is it true they got stung by a wasp, and their face got all swollen, then they got stung by another wasp?I bet they were shaking trees. That's always when I get stung. I shake a tree and yell, "Hey, Wasp Dudes!"Then I always gotta yell, "Ah! Stop it, Wasp Dudes!"
I saw their face was all swollen and ouchie-lookin'.Man, a wasp sting makes a big round head look even rounder, huh?
Didja know they found a fossil?! I'm so jealous. I wanna dig up old dead things, .
Didja see them hitting all the rocks?! That musta scared all the bugs living underneath 'em!Probably scared the rocks too, !

I heard they were burying Bells in a hole, and I heard if you put Bells in a hole, something cool happens!I think a cool thing happening when you bury Bells would be cool, but I think it's maybe a suburban legendBut I said the same stuff about -flavored ice cream, and that's real. Real delicious!
They picked up so many fruits, I was worried they'd figured something out about that I haven't.But I talked to a lotta today, and none of 'em told me anything they haven't told me before.

I was gonna say how I saw 'em using their phone a bunchbut maybe we could talk about other stuff?I met a bug named Frithjof today, and I think that's a real cool name.I saw a UFO last night. It was shaped weird and went woo-woo-burp-woo.I tasted a smell this morning! Since I wasn't all the way awake, I forgot ya can't taste smells. It was neat to do.And just now, I saw you comin' at me like ya wanted to talk, and I had a whole fight-or-flight thing!Anyway Yeah, your friend sure was on their phone a bunch, .

They got a real phone thing goin' on, huh? Everybody says they always see 'em walking around, staring at it.I get it. I open "Critterpedia," then suddenly it's dinnertime, and I've missed four other food-times!
Did they make a buncha roads? I'm getting lost a lot more today than I usually do.A huh huh, I don't even know where I am right now, !
I saw them touching the river a lot. And the river changed shape, didn't it? That's crazy, .I wonder what the fishies think about someone remodeling their house?

The cliffs are different today. Did they do that? What a crazy hobby.Only kinda related, but did I ever tell ya about a cool guy named Cliff who hid in my attic for years?Folks say I imagined him, but he was still cool, .
Hey, is your friend into fences? Like, as a hobby? 'Cause I didn't know that was a thing.They looked serious figurin' out which bit of fence went where. It seemed real zen, .

What was going on with the outside furniture? They'd place it, turn it, move it, turn it, remove it, place itThen they'd look to see if anyone's watching, and they'd see me pretend like I'm not watchingAnd then they'd move it, turn it, turn it, turn it, still look confused Real weird stuff, .

I heard 'em say something about having a buncha miles saved up.I got a buncha miles too. I oughta spend mine. I dunno on what, though. Maybe on a rocket ship?WOOSH! Lookit me! I'm on a rocket! I'm goin' to the moon! WOOSH! Uh-oh! I dunno how to fly a rocket ship!AHHH I'M GONNA—<10_10 /> CRASH! BOOM!<10_9 />A huh huh, I'm a lousy astronaut!
Did they finish paying off their loan from Tom Nook? Yeah?! That's real darn neat!Yeah, nobody boogies like that in front of Resident Services unless they're real happy, .
I dunno why, but I saw them going in and out of Nook's Cranny over and over and over and over again.I'd get it if it was a revolving door, . Those things are fun!

Didja notice the new island tune? I heard it and said, "Whoa! That's new!" Then I whistled it a bunch!But I goofed up my whistle and forgot the tune. So I stood outside and listened till I heard it again.It's real pretty, !
I was over by Resident Services and saw they made a new flag. It's real neat looking.I made a flag once. I used finger paints on a bedsheet. Isabelle said it was too nice to hang on the flagpole.
I saw them using a transformation wand to change outfits! I wanna try a wand, !DING! I'm a superhero! DING! I'm an astronaut! DING! I'm a princess! DING! I'm !
I saw 'em using their vaulting pole to jump over rivers. That looks like so much fun!
Did they buy a buncha turnips from Daisy Mae? I bought someand lost 'em.Ah well, I had a full belly by the time I got home, so it was all good, .

How'd they do on turnips? I heard it was a capital gain, but I dunno much about aftermarket turnip valuation.And I'm clean outta the loop on short sells and margin calls, but I like watching the TV business show.They always show a real good peanut butter commercial. <10_4 />I like crunchy the best. Gives you more to do.

I saw 'em chatting and I thought, "What are they saying?" Then I thought, "I shouldn't eaves drop."Then I thought, "What are eaves, and would I know if I dropped them?"Then I thought how if I could hear what they were saying, then I'd know if I should be dropping eaves or not!They just kept chatting it up, but the whole thing got real exhausting, and I just went home, .
Man, they were pulling weeds like maybe they'd find some treasure if they pulled the right one.Hmm What if they were right? I'm gonna go pull some weeds and find out, .
Did they get a new 'do? Man, I'd like a new 'do.<10_4 /> How do you do a 'do?
Did they get a new look? I keep thinking I should get a new lookLike, maybe I could get a third eyeball, or an extra mouth, or an opposable thumb or something.
Did they take a buncha pictures with their camera? Vacation pictures are the best.You can say, "Look! This is me! This is me too, but in a different place!"
I heard they were doing a whole lotta swimming and diving. It makes me pretty curious, .Like, what IS under the sea? A whole lotta fish live there, so it's gotta be something good, a huh huh huh
